name: §5Phantomized Slime
description:
A reborn slime after dying to a player who was attempting to run from §o'something'§r lurking in the shadows. As a reborn slime, you have experienced death and swear to avenge and protect those in need.

Due to being just a meek little slime, you avoid trouble and stick to the shadows, remembering what hunted the original player that killed you.
